displayProperties.description: As a Sunbreaker using Code of the Fire-Forged or Code of the Siegebreaker, land final blows at long range with Hammer of Sol.  Guardians grant the most efficient progress.
displayProperties.name: Bring Down the Hammer

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Requires equipped Guardian Games class item.
